informations.rooms: The apartment consists of 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, with bed linen and towels, flat screen TV, dining area with fully equipped kitchen and balcony overlooking the deck. Guests at the apartment can enjoy an Italian breakfast.
informations.place: The Belvedere is located in the historic center of Gravina a stone's throw from the aqueduct bridge. Equipped with every comfort. The area is very nice and quiet. Its location is excellent for easily reaching the main points to visit in our area.

modal.air: Each room has state-of-the-art air conditioning systems to ensure fresh and pleasant stays.

modal.tv: For a truly superior hospitality experience, each room is equipped with two televisions to offer entertainment, leisure and information.
